name: Crunches with Cable
how_to_perform:
1. Adjust the cable so that it is at chest height.
2. Lie on a flat bench in a position where your back is almost touching the pad and your feet are planted firmly on the ground.
3. Hold onto the handle of the cable with both hands, keeping them shoulder-width apart.
4. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine.
5. Slowly lift your torso off the bench by curling up towards the ceiling, keeping the cable steady and your arms straight.
6. Focus on using your rectus abdominis muscles to lift yourself, squeezing them at the top of the movement.
7. Lower back down to the starting position, keeping control throughout the exercise.
8. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Crunches with Cable target the abs and obliques using resistance from a cable machine.
